Have you ever thought about studying multiple languages? Have you ever thought about doing a c1 in either Russian, Turkish or some other western language, then this is the right software for you. Install it, start it up and get into a mm of your favorite map, then you'll find some cool lads experienced in the language you desire to learn. I have learned a lot of cursewords in my years and I am thankfull for every son of Putin I could meet. For real though, good way and easy way to learn sum Russian
Anti cheat sucks but still you can't hate it
